title: Table Cover, late 18th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: block printed using resist, then indigo dyed on plain weave
markings: Red embroidered mark in one corner which may be initials.
description: Small table cover with design of a croissant, pot of chocolate or coffee and a dish with a long handled spoon repeated on each side. In white on blue. Hemmed top and bottom.

tombstone.epitaph:
Table Cover, late 18th century.
late 18th century. Medium: linen
Technique: block printed using resist, then indigo dyed on plain weave. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-309.
